plot: This is a story about a little girl who lives in an old house in the mountains. Her name is Bincho-tan. Each episode depicts a day in the life of Bincho-tan as she prepares her breakfast in the morning, goes to the forest to gather vegetables, does her household chores and rests at night after a day's work. She is surrounded by a group of close friends who adds color to her ordinary yet simple life.
ending_theme: "Binchō Ondo (びんちょう音頭)" by Mai Kadowaki
